<p><strong>Atropine:</strong> an alkaloid found in belladonna (Atropa belladonna). It affects the nervous system and is used in medicine under strict control.
</p>


<a href="https://chemapps.stolaf.edu/jmol/jmol.php?model=C1CN2CC3=CCO[C@H]4CC(=O)N5[C@H]6[C@H]4[C@H]3C[C@H]2[C@@]61C7=CC=CC=C75">
  <img src="Estricnina.png" alt="Estricnina" style="max-width: 150px; height: auto;">
</a>
<p><strong>Strychnine:</strong> highly toxic substance found in the plant *Strychnos nux-vomica*. It acts on the central nervous system, causing intense convulsions.</p>

<a href="https://chemapps.stolaf.edu/jmol/jmol.php?&pdbid=2aai">
  <img src="ricina.png" alt="Ricina" style="max-width: 150px; height: auto;">
</a>
<p><strong>Ricin:</strong> toxin found in castor beans (*Ricinus communis*). It inhibits protein synthesis and is considered extremely lethal.</p>
